text: Barry Trotz is asked how much Varlamov's performance from Thursday will impact his decision on a starter for tomorrow: "A big portion for sure." #Isles #Pens
#Isles Barry Trotz on how much Semyon Varlamov's performance in Game 3 will weigh into his decision on the starter tomorrow: "Oh a big portion for sure."
For todays game its fair to say Sorokin should start. For games 2 & 3 Trotz had the right to make the call he did #isles https://t.co/KYctaD4ZN0
Goaltender Ilya Sorokin leads the Islanders onto the ice for Game 4.  He made 39 saves in Game 1 a 4-3 overtime win.
